name: Celestius
tips: Use Astral Defense for a surprising effect.

ski.name: ASTRAL FIRE
desc: Heavenly King summons forth an astral fire from beneath the ground, dealing Magical Damage to enemy units in target area and Rooting for 0.3 seconds.

ski.name: ASTRAL STEP
desc: Heavenly King steps through the astral plain, instantly blinking to a target location. Blink deals damage to surrounding area at both points of travel.

ski.name: DRAGON FAMILIAR
desc: Passive: coils an almighty dragon around Heavenly King when fully charged, dealing continuous damage to surrounding enemy units._Active: surges dragon at a target location, dealing damage to enemy units along the way and continually draining Mana. Deals continuous damage to tangled enemy units, acquiring field of vision. Re-cast ability to send dragon soaring, dealing damage. Unaffected by cooldown reduction items.
study: Passive: deals continuous damage. Active: deals high damage.

ski.name: ASTRAL DEFENSE
desc: Passive: each ability cast generates 1 shield layer that increases Heavenly Kingâ€™ Spell Power and Spell Resist, up to 3 stacks. Active: Heavenly King expends his energy shields in a single burst, dealing explosive damage to surrounding enemy units. The more shield layers active, the higher the damage dealt.
study: Gains shields which deal damage when detonated.
update: Magical Damage and buff effect increased.

story: It's said, at the very top of the Heaven lies a splendid palace, where Celestius, Emperor of the Gods, rules over the realms of the universe. He used to be a prince. After ten thousand calamities, he ascended. But still, the calamities came by the thousands, then the millions, until Celestius ultimately attained enlightenment.
